Title: Bears Will Be Bears
Plot: After a case of breaking and entering has one of the intruders go missing, Nick and Hank talk to a mysterious family whose cultural background blurs the line of right and wrong. Meanwhile, Nick tasks Monroe with the safeguarding Aunt Marie, who was almost killed the night prior by a hexenbiest.
GuestStars: Currie Graham, Amy Gumenick, Ayanna Berkshire, Parker Bagley
